Energy Efficiency in Copier Rentals

June 20, 2025 Marga Enterprises

In todayâ€™s business world, energy efficiency is more than just a buzzwordâ€”itâ€™s a necessity. As companies look for ways to reduce operational costs and lower their carbon footprint, office equipment like copiers is coming under greater scrutiny. One impactful solution is choosing energy-efficient copier rentals.

This blog post explores the importance of energy efficiency in copier rentals, what features to look for, and how your business can benefitâ€”both financially and environmentally.

Why Energy Efficiency Matters in Copier Rentals

Office copiers run for hours every day, consuming electricity whether theyâ€™re actively printing or sitting idle. Over time, this adds upâ€”not just in energy bills, but in environmental impact. By switching to energy-efficient copier rentals, businesses can:

  • Lower their electricity usage

  • Reduce greenhouse gas emissions

  • Improve sustainability reporting

  • Decrease long-term operational costs

Most modern energy-efficient copiers are designed with smart features that automatically manage power usage without disrupting workflow.

ðŸ‘‰ Read more about energy efficiency in copier rentals.

Features of Energy-Efficient Copiers

When selecting a copier for your office, here are the key features that contribute to better energy performance:

1. Sleep Mode and Auto Power-Off

Many energy-efficient copiers enter sleep mode after a few minutes of inactivity and automatically power off overnight or during weekends. These features dramatically reduce energy consumption without affecting productivity.

2. Low TEC (Typical Electricity Consumption) Rating

The TEC rating measures how much energy a copier uses in a standard week. Devices with low TEC values are more efficient and cost-effective in the long run.

3. Quick Recovery Time

Fast wake-up times from sleep or power-save modes mean users donâ€™t have to waitâ€”making it easier for staff to adopt eco-friendly print behaviors.

4. LED or Energy-Efficient Fusing Technology

Instead of traditional heating elements, some copiers use LED-based fusing units that warm up quickly and use less power.

ðŸ‘‰ Learn more about eco-friendly copier technologies.

Benefits of Energy-Efficient Copier Rentals

1. Reduced Operating Costs

Lower energy usage means lower monthly utility bills. When multiplied across multiple machines or office locations, these savings can be significant.

2. Environmental Responsibility

Energy-efficient copiers contribute to a cleaner planet by lowering COâ‚‚ emissions. This is especially valuable for businesses that track their environmental impact or pursue green certifications.

3. Improved Office Comfort

Copiers that generate less heat help maintain a cooler office environmentâ€”reducing the load on air conditioning systems.

4. Longer Equipment Life

Efficient machines are often designed with better components and smarter systems, which means less wear and tear over time.

How to Maximize Energy Efficiency in Your Copier Rental

Conduct a Needs Assessment

Before renting a copier, assess your average printing volume and needs. A smaller team may not require a large, power-hungry unit. Right-sizing your copier ensures you get efficiency and performance in balance.

Choose Models with ENERGY STARÂ® Certification

Look for copiers that meet ENERGY STARÂ® or similar energy-efficiency standards. These models are tested for real-world performance and verified to use less power.

Set Up Smart Defaults

Work with your rental provider to configure the device to:

  • Use duplex printing as default

  • Enable sleep and auto-off features

  • Track usage to identify waste

ðŸ‘‰ Hereâ€™s how to start reducing paper waste in copier rentals.

Maintain Your Copier Regularly

Even energy-efficient machines require proper maintenance. Dust buildup or worn components can decrease efficiency. Ensure your rental includes service checks and updates.

ðŸ‘‰ Read our tips on maintenance for eco-friendly copiers.

Donâ€™t Forget About Toner and Consumables

Energy efficiency goes hand-in-hand with waste reduction. When selecting a copier, choose models compatible with:

  • High-yield toner cartridges

  • Recyclable supplies

  • Waste-reduction programs

Many rental providers now offer recycling programs for toner and partsâ€”helping you extend sustainability beyond electricity savings.

ðŸ‘‰ Explore recycling programs for copiers.

Final Thoughts

Improving energy efficiency in copier rentals is a simple but powerful way to create a more sustainable office. By choosing smart, efficient machinesâ€”and configuring them for best performanceâ€”businesses can enjoy lower costs, better productivity, and a lighter environmental footprint.

Whether you're renting for a short-term project or outfitting a long-term office setup, be intentional about your choices. The copier you use every day can either drain resources or help preserve themâ€”it all depends on what you select.
